overview.en: The Pangolin project is a blockchain DAPP based on Pangolin Traffic Encryption Protocol.Pangolin encripted network traffic can save more than 90% of your money compare to centralized products.It's very suitable for scenarios such as high-quality video steamming, video games, SNS, business transcations,design, development and study abroad.
overview.zh: Pangolin》项目是基于Pangolin流量加密协议中的一款区块链DAPP应用产品。《Pangolin》使用安全加密，费用比同类中心化的产品节省90%以上成本，适用于高速看视频，游戏娱乐，海量社交，海量业务，设计开发，留学考研，论文资料查询等各种应用场景，目前《Pangolin》测试版已经发布，并免费使用
